participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves trying new tricks on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introverted, enjoys spending time with his bees and nature.
participant_2.background: i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya. i am a bee farmer.

content.text: i live in the suburbs , but i live in florida .
